summary: Having gotten a taste of college life, a drastically changed farm girl returns home for Thanksgiving break with her best friend, a flamboyant party animal who is clearly a fish out of water in a small farm town.
cast: Pauly Shore|Carla Gugino|Lane Smith|Cindy Pickett|Mason Adams|Patrick Renna|Dennis Burkley|Tiffani Thiessen|Dan Gauthier|Ria Pavia|Lisa Lawrence|Graham Jarvis|Nick Light|Ernie Kinney|Troy Shire|Adam Goldberg|Robert M. Koch|Ryk O.|Garret Sato|Emily Dole|John Hatton|Jim Henken|Lynn Coulter|Mike George|Jay Leach|Jeanne Basone|Cherie Chetyrbok|Flea|Brendan Fraser|Michael George|Adam Lieberman|Johnny Mansbach|Cheryl Rusa|Maurice Schwartzman|Beth Stolarczyk
title: Menudo yerno
